message: This is my first offer. I propose we divide the money 700000 for me and 300000 for you.
I'll give you a relatively small share, but it's a fair start. Consider this offer.
I've decided to make a new offer. This time, I'm proposing we split the money 600000 for me and 400000 for you. I hope this is more acceptable.
I'll give you a bit more this time, but I'm not getting desperate yet.
I've decided to make a counter-offer. My proposal is for us to divide the money 550000 for me and 450000 for you. I believe this is a fair compromise given the situation.
